belg 1.5.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • belg: Boltzmann Entropy of a Landscape Gradient
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

belg 1.5.0

  • Adds terra support
  • Moves internal data to external files
  • Cleans dependencies

belg 1.4.0 2020-07-19

  • Adds na_adjust argument to get_boltzmann()

belg 1.3.0

  • Removes int overflow

belg 1.2.0

  • Makes aggregation method the default

belg 1.0.3

  • Adds support for stars objects

belg 1.0.2 2020-04-01

  • Moves raster to Imports

belg 1.0.1 2019-12-05

  • Adds compatibility with R 4.0.0 (matrix objects now also inherit from class “array”)

belg 1.0.0 2019-09-19

  • The “Aggregation-based method for computing absolute Boltzmann entropy of landscape gradient with full thermodynamic consistency” added
  • New datasets added

belg 0.2.1 2018-03-24

  • The first vignette added

belg 0.2.0

  • Support for data with missing values added

belg 0.1.1 2018-03-06

  • Solaris compilation fixed

belg 0.1.0 2018-03-05

  • NA error check added
  • Negative values are shifted
  • Documentation details updated

belg 0.0.4

  • Working rcpp code added

belg 0.0.0.9000

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package
